keywords.value: The Curse of Beauty: The Scandalous and Tragic Life of Audrey Munson, America's First Supermodel (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.value: Jackie Robinson in Quotes: The Remarkable Life of Baseball's Most Significant Player (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: “The Curse of Beauty” by James Bone profiles Audrey Munson, a New Yorker who modeled for many statues. “Jackie Robinson in Quotes” covers the athlete’s fight for racial justice.

headline.print_headline: America’s Venus; The Words of No. 42
headline.main: The Tragic Life of America’s First Supermodel

snippet: “The Curse of Beauty” by James Bone profiles Audrey Munson, a New Yorker who modeled for many statues. “Jackie Robinson in Quotes” covers the athlete’s fight for racial justice.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books The Curse of Beauty: The Scandalous and Tragic Life of Audrey Munson, America’s First Supermodel by James Bone, and Jackie Robinson in Quotes: The Remarkable Life of Baseball’s Most Significant Player by Danny Peary.
